content.body: Oh, I thought https://github.com/whatwg/wattsi/pull/161 would fix this...
not also fixed in bikeshed yet, maybe?

content.body: Maybe HTML's stylesheet doesn't do the darkmode-aware thing? Although I thought that part was shared between HTML and Bikeshed specs.
The fix there is in the markup of the image itself, html is using its own file.
